options.title: File options
options.export_public_only_title: All exports from this site will contain only public data (no private data will be included)
options.export_bundle_groups_title: Includes groups for every player selected when exporting via advanced file list

types.players: Filter players by server, class, guild and/or username
types.groups: Filter groups by server or name

filters.c: Player class, use full class name in lower case (eg.: berserker, battle mage)
filters.#: Show only players with specified tags
filters.f: Show only first or first n entries
filters.q: Custom settings (separate header names with comma)

tooltip.pin: Pin script to the top of the list
tooltip.assigned: This script is assigned to current table
tooltip.remote_verified: This script is published and verified
tooltip.remote_copy: Click here to copy the code

sidebar.assign: Assign selected script to current table
sidebar.remote_update: Publish new version of selected script

info.deprecated: Use of #{name1} is deprecated; use #{name2} instead

remote_author_missing.title: You must set your user name before you can publish scripts
remote_author_missing.message: Please head over to Settings and set your 'author name for published scripts'

guilds.missing: Player data is missing for following members:

share.title: File export
share.public: Export only public data (regardless of your current global setting)
share.expire: The code will automatically expire after 2 days.
share.single_use_notice: Please consider keeping this option enabled unless you plan to share the file with multiple people.

settings.title: Global configuration
settings.skip_grid_if_single_entry_present: Skip to player/group detail if alone in grid

recovery.title: Recovery
recovery.description#:
With the options below you can export & import all data stored within the website.
It is recommended to export your data at least once a month in order to prevent accidental loss of data.
recovery.toast: Recovery process just started. Please keep in mind that this can take a long time depending on the size of your recovery file.
recovery.notice:
Are you sure you want to recover SFTools from this file?

This operation will erase all of your existing data in order to proceed!

links.title: Player / guild merges
links.import_title: Are you sure you want to import all merges?
links.reset_title: Are you sure you want to reset all merges?

generate.iterations: Amount of iterations per thread when generating a pet map.
generate.tooltip: Generate a level / gladiator success map. Only possible with own pet against a dungeon boss.

errors.error_player_not_found: Character was not found on the server

open_error.title: Database could not be opened
open_error.message: Please verify that you are not in incognito mode and your browser supports Indexed DB

database.import_error: An error has occured while importing file
database.fatal_error#: Your browser does not support all features required by this page!</br>This issue can be also caused by use of private mode.

update_info.title: A database update is in progress
update_info.message: Please do not exit the page until loading stops. This may take a while depending on the size of your database.

request.title: is requesting your character data
request.notice#:
Please select a character that you wish to share with the website.
No personal data will be shared!
request.access: Click here to grant this domain access to your characters
request.access_hint: Please note that using ad or tracker blockers might prevent you from loading all of your stored characters

error.title: Request error
error.notice#: A website has requested your character data but did not specify required parameters

link.warning: Please note that any script assignments and trackers will be merged into the target object. This action cannot be reversed!

unlink.warning: Please note that any script assignments and trackers will remain under the source object.

list.default: This script is available to everyone locally

limit.title: Maximum amount of entries to be displayed

delete_all.title: Delete all
delete_all.notice: Are you sure you want to delete all stored player data?

delete_script.title: Remove script
delete_script.notice: Are you sure you want to permanently remove selected script?
delete_script.notice_bonus_remote: This will not unpublish your script and you will lose edit access to it!
delete_script.notice_bonus_used: This script is currently applied to following tables: #{tables}

delete_remote_script.title: Unpublish script
delete_remote_script.message: This action will revoke the code associated with this script and it will be deleted permanently! Are you sure you want to continue?

remote_script_verification.title: Script verification
remote_script_verification.message:
Your script has to be verified before it is made available in the public repository. By proceeding with this action you will automatically request verification.

The verification process may take up to several days.

error.title: A fatal error has occured!
error.notice#:
This error might have also been caused by your current profile.
Click the revert button below to revert back to default profile.
error.refresh: Click here or refresh the page
